cold_snaps.status: At present, there is no cold snap. This year has seen 6 cold snaps; typically, 3.7 cold snaps occur annually.

extreme.status: The largest temperature difference recorded was 26.7°C on 29 April 2025. On that date the temperature reached 27.1°C and fell to 0.4°C.

heatwave.status: No heatwave is happening right now. There have been 6 such events this year, compared to a usual average of 1.9 per year.

heaviest_rainfall.status: Record amounts of rain fell over 7.9 hours today with a total accumulation of 13.04mm.  It fell at 8.6 mm per hour at times and ranked 8th from our records.  The most intense rainfall recorded took place on 04 January 2025, with precipitation totalling 27.64mm reaching 4.6mm per hour at times.  The event lasted 15.9 hours.

heaviest_rainrate.status: 27.0mm per hour was the peak rain rate recorded on 03 September 2025 ranking first from our records.  This was sustained over 2.0 hours and 27.0mm per hour was faliing at times.  The heaviest rain was recorded on 03 September 2025 with a peak rain rate of 27.0mm per hour, lasting 2.0 hours and totalling rainfall of 7.99mm.

storm.status: The longest rain storm on record lasted 23.2 hours on 23 November 2024 when 24.56mm of rain fell and at one point was falling at 6.4mm per hour.
A storm is currently nearby. It's the first significant weather event since September 03, 2025.

top_10_rainy.status: It is currently one of the longest rainy periods. It is the 4th longest since our records started in August 2024. There have been 9 consecutive days where it has been rainy starting on August 26, 2025.

tropical: The last tropical night was July 18, 2025, with only 62 such nights since 1973.

average.status: The current wind direction is south-westerly (210°), which is about average.  In the UK, a south-westerly wind often means mild and wet weather.

gusts.status: 93.7 mph was the largest wind gust recorded on 13 Oct 2012.

run.status: To date, the maximum wind run recorded was 1754 miles on 21 Oct 2012.  The long-term average wind run is 229.42 miles and so far today the wind run is 78.3 miles.

speed.status: To date, the maximum wind speed recorded was 93.7 mph on 13 Oct 2012.

summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 3.8°C) and outside temperature (up 2.9°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1701 m), light levels (up 3094 lux), and inside temperature (up 2.2°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 114.8m lower than yesterday, 598.0m lower than the past week, 1701.2m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 713m to a maximum of 1594m, averaging 952.2m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1550.2m and 2650m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: Partial cloudiness with some periods of sun.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, you’ll experience intense stickiness in the air and little or no wind. Light to moderate rain is forecast, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and some sunny spells will occur. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
